/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and trucks can be seen driving on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. In the distance, mountains rise against the sky, adding a natural backdrop to the urban setting. The image is a blend of urban life and nature, showcasing the vibrant cityscape of Beijing.
